div.p:
Curia burgi de aberdene tenta per prepositum et ballivos xvto die februarij anno et cetera
lxxiiijto /

quo die Jacobus saithlee posuit se in voluntate prepositi pro foristallacione
huius burgi /et inuenit gilbertum Vaus plegium ad intrandum coram preposito et
consulibus die veneris proximo futuro subeundo eorum ordinacioni pro suo forisfacto et cetera

The xvij day of februar' the yer' et cetera lxxiiii It is ordanit and decretit
be thealdirman and the consel vndirwritin that the commoune Seil and the secret seil
salbe deliuerit frely to the aldirman that beis chosin for the tyme and to
the counsale yerly fra thine furth apon the friday next eftir that the
aldirman be chosin and tobe deliuerit agane at thare wil in keping to
quhom that plesis thaim best / And that na letter salbe selit fra thine
furth with the common seil bot at the sycht of thealdirman and the hail consel
And thir ar the namys of the forsaid consel Alexander of chavmer aldirman
in the tyme alexander meignes Richard of Kyntor Johne of marr' andro
scherar' Johne Wode Johne of Knollis alexander blindzele Robert of culan
Dauid colison Dauid symson Johne the vaus gilbert of chavmer alexander
howison thomas of chavmer gilbert the vaus Edmond lowson Dauy
mathoson Johne Wormot patrik badenach Johne of glenmalvin

The same day It is ordanit that all nychtbouris that has ony landis in tak of
the last assedacione sal entir at Witsunday next tocum videlicet the date of
the yer' of our lord et cetera lxxv yeris And thare entray of the wateris
at candilmes last bygane the date of the yer' et cetera lxxiiiij yeris

Curia legalis burgi de aberdene tenta in pretorio per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem
vicesimo die februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxiiijto quo die sectis vocatis et curia
affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die thomas adamson piscator alborum piscium in amerciamento quietus per
assisam et per confessionem propriam pro iniusta percussione et lesione Jacobi trail

Item eodem die gilbertus vaus deuenit plegius pro Adriano Ingisbrek calump
niato per Arthurum forbes de iniusta detencione xij coronarum super eundem ut asserit
optent' / quod dictus Edrianus erit Responsurus et Juri pariturus dicto arthuro
aut suis procuratoribus pluribus aut vni super dicta summa prout Jura volunt
Vnde dictus arthurus in Judicio constituit et ordinauit patricium de badenach burgensem
huius burgi et Johannem de meldrum suos procuratores coniunctim et diuisim ad prosequendum
prefatum edrianum de dictis xij coronis vsque ad integram solucionem earundem

The same day a sworne assise has decretit and deliuerit that Edrian
Ingisbrek sal content and pay til Paule simonson maistir of a schip
of Danskyn a crowne for fracht and vij dusan of thornbakkis
eftir the tenour of the deposiciones schavin to theassise tharupon

Moricius bissat in amerciamento pro iniusta extensione plegij / quod Ricardus de Kyntor et alexander
blinschel tanquam suspecti remoueri debuissent ab assisa de actione inter ipsum et
alexandrum rede / et contrarium adiudicatum fuit per curiam et cetera

The same day at the commaund of our soueran lordis lettres direct to the aldirman
and baillies of aberdene Paule simondson maistir of a schip of Danskyn
was chargit be the aldirman and baillies forsaid as is vndirwritin the quhilk
the gret aith sworne deponit that twa men of Edinburgh war frachtis
men til him of vthirhalf Danskyn last quhilk haldis xxj barellis
quhilk was deliuerit in his schip / and he sperit quha soulde pay
him / and the said men videlicet george cant and Sandy levyntoune ansuerit
til him and said that Johne of ruthirfurd sould pay him vij noblis qof
the quhilkis xxj barellis the maistir deliuerit til Johne of ruthir
furd in aberdene and he pait him vij noblis' for the fracht / and he
wate nocht quha aw the gude bot the forsaid men of edinburgh war' principal
frachtaris til him

Item eodem die Willelmus lutar primo die vocatus per alexandrum chavmer seriandum ad
comparendum responsurus alexandro sanquhar super plegium per eum porrectum pro iniusta
detencione xxv s' ab ipso alexandro Non comparuit Et Ideo precipitur sergeando capere
districtum et cetera et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad 2m diem et cetera

In Curia tenta per ballivos xxjo die februarij anno a nativitate Domini millesimo iiijto
lxxiiijto quidam Ranaldus et alius ruralis nomine Willelmus ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur
in amerciamento curie per concessiones Proprias pro perturbacione adinuicem

Eodem die Willelmus symson accusatus pro foristallacione lane pellium et coreorum ac
regratacione / confessus fuit pell' et ideo in amerciamento / et de Residuo ad assisam per
quam conuictus fuit pro lana et regratacione et acquietavit se de corrio ex deliber
acione assise et cetera in iibus aliis amerciamentis Et die xxvta februarij consilium taxauit
taxatus ij marcas dictum Willelmum ad soluendum duas marcas pro pena

Adam Walkar per prelocutorem suum gilbertum vaus posuit se in voluntate prepositi
et ballivorum de disobediencia Duncani straloch seriandi ministrantis in
officio pro qua adiudicatur in amerciamento et cetera

Dauid galichly conuictus per assisam de perturbacione domini Willelmi scot capellani
verbotenus adiudicatur in amerciamento curie Et similiter inuentum fuit quod dictus dominus Willelmus
perturbavit dictum Dauid in verbo aliquantilum
Et assisa ordinavit dictum Dauid pro emenda deliberare ij li' cere ad
missam sancti sanguinis

Gilbertus Vaus dedit alexandrum rede plegium legalem de indempnitate Dauid ga
lichly aliter quam Jura volunt Et simili modo thomas symson plegius pro
dicto Dauid quod gilbertus vaus indempnabitur et cetera
Curia tenta per prepositum et ballivos xxv die februarij /

quo die Johannes portar adiudicatur
in duobus amerciamentis per concessionem suam propriam pro foristallacione pellium et corriorum de quibus po
suit se in voluntate prepositi

Eodem die Johannes necolson pro foristallacione taxatus fuit per prepositum et consilium ad soluendum dimidium marce
pro pena et cetera
taxatus xxx s' Memorandum quod Thomas prat fatebatur se plegium pro alexandro anguson ad soluendum xxx s' pro foristallacione
x s' Item dictus thomas plegius pro thoma fynlau composuit ad instanciam Abbatis de Dere pro x s'
x s' Johannes de mar composuit pro vno foristallatore pro x s'
x s' Dauid colison plegius pro quodam foristallatore nuncupatus Willelmus gariach cum quo compositur
x s' Thomas schethyn plegius pro foristallatore quj composuit pro x s'
taxati xxx s' Willelmus moir et thomas moir isti duo foristallatores composuerunt cum preposito pro xxx s'
x s' Jacobus ihoneson composuit pro x s' pro pena foristallacionis
viij s' Andreas gelis commorans in garuiach' composuit pro x s' plegio viij s' et solut' preposito

Johannes necolson de consensu prepositi et consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde huius burgi racione paterne libertatis prestito solito Juramento
v s' pro qua libertate soluit preposito v s' in alba bursa
John' portar is extentit be the Counsale for x s' to pay at pasche
Wil Portar is set to x s' to pay at pasche
Sandy sanquhar' chapman componit for vj s' borch sandris his brothir
Johne Williamson chapman componit for vj s' viij d' borch george browne

Wat pyot borch for patrik clerk chapman taxt to iiij s' to pay betuix
this and Witsunday et cetera
Curia tenta per prepositum et balliuos die penultima februarii anno et cetera lxxiiijto /

quo
die Willelmus portar accusatus pro foristallacione lane pellium et coriorum posuit
se ad assisam negando dictam calumpniam asserens se taliter non foristallasse infra
vnum annum integrum et vltra vltimo preterit' / per quam assisam mature auisatam
deliberatum fuit quod si vellet purgare se de huiusmodi foristallacione ut premittitur
quitus fuit de dicta calumpnia / Vnde idem Willelmus obtulit se ad Juramentum veluti
decretum fuit preterquam de regratacione pro qua adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento eo quod
posuit se in voluntate prepositi de eadem et de Residuo quitus / et soluit pro pena
taxatus x s' x s' ad pascha / plegio Johanne portar / hec taxacio prescribitur in altero latere

Eodem die thomas Watson taxatus fuit per consilium pro foristallacione sua de qua posuit
taxatus xx s' se in voluntate prepositi de lana ad soluendum pro pena xx s' ad pascha proxima
dimidium marce Johannes glenmalin composuit pro quodam foristallatore taxat' pro pena vj s' viij d'

The same day In presence of Alexander lesly serefdeput of aberdene thir' persons
Vndirwritin that is to say alexander menyes androw alanson Johne of mar Johne
Wode Johne of Knollis Dauid colison Dauy symson Johne the Vaus gil
bert of chavmer gilbert Vaus thom of chavmer alexander rede lyndsay har
rold and Dauy mathoson war' chosin in ane assise with the consent of Robert
blindsel to knaw apon the Richt clamit be the said Robert of the tak of the
sundais fisch and of vthiris dewiteis pertening to the kirk wark Referrand
him to thare deliuerence tharupon The quhilkis personis the gret aith
sworne the allegaciones and resounys of the said Robert be thame herd and
vndirstandin and tharapon diligently avisit / decretit deliuerit and
concludit before the forsaid alexander lesly serefdeput In presence of the said Robert
blindsel na man gainsayand / that he has na richt nor clame of rycht
to the said tak / bot allanerly gilbert morison the quhilk aw to bruke
the forsaid tak eftir the tenour of the assedacione made til him tharupon

Curia burgi de aberdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito ballivis et consulibus eiusdem secundo die
mensis marcij anno Domini et cetera lxxiiijo

Quo die Cristiana Irvyn Relicta Cristinj litstar
quondam burgensis dicti burgi secundo die sepe vocata ad comparendum et ostendendum suam racionem
et Jura de occupacione Ville de Garrowne cum pertinenciis libertati huius burgi spectan' veluti
erat summonita per Alexandrum chavmer vnum seriandorum dicti burgi dsuam summonicionem legitime
probantem per testes infrascriptos videlicet Johannem hil Willelmum modan et Willelmum de burnesyde /
quj Jurati deposuerunt quod presentes fuerunt viderunt audiuerunt et pro testibus
onerati quoniam dictus sergeandus summoniebat et premuniebat prefatam Cristianam apud
dictam villam de garrowne ad comparendum sua Jura et raciones ostensure de occupacione
eiusdem ville de garrowne ut predictum est secundum tenorem precepti sibi desuper directi Et
non comparuit Quare precipitur dicto sergeando quod capiat districtum ab eadem ad valorem amerciamenti curie
et liberare eundem ad plegium si petatur Et citand' ac premuniend' eandem Cristianam ad
comparendum coram preposito ballivis et consulibus predictis xvijo die instantis mensis marcij hora causarum
tanquam ad tercium diem huius processus
Item eodem die dicta cristiana Irvyn adiudicatur in amerciamento curie in defectu secte et cetera

The ferd dai of marche the yer' of god forsaid Thomas of chawmer and Dauid matho
son' menyt thaim and complenyeit to the aldirman and the consale / that thai war' discurssit
and put fra thar' tackis of the fuyrdis on the wattir of Dee / of the quhilkis thai
war in possession' of before / and askit remede tharof at the aldirman and consale /
the quhilkis aldirman and the maist part of the consale than beand present grauntit and
consentit / that thai suld be Restorit to thare tackis that thai had of before or
til alsgude takkis at the next assedacion' eftir the date of this present assedacion
Curia Burgj de aberdene tenta per ballivos eiusdem xiijo die marcij anno et cetera lxxiiijto

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in assisam videlicet Alexander de camera prepositus alexander menyes
andreas alanj Ricardus Kintor andreas scherar Johannes de Knollis Dauid colison Dauid
symson alexander rede thomas chavmer gilbertus Vaus Jacobus cummyn lindesay har
raldus Dauid mathoson Willelmus cantly gilbertus morison et Dauid hil burgenses dicti burgi
quhilkis the gret aith sworne to decide the debatis betuix Johne gregory folowar'
on theta part and henry mortimar' on / the tothir part has decretit deliuerit and
ordanit as eftir folowis first that the said henry mortimar' sal parte and
distribute evinly betuix him and Johne gregory the pak of wauld brocht hame
be him And anent the gudis and merchandice quhilkis the said John ordanit toby
in bery merket / thai haue chargit the said henry to tak a lele marchand
man of the sam rais' vnsuspect in his hand quhilk sal swere with him that he
sawld nane of John gregorijs serplar' of skynis or he past to bery merket
and that he borowit na siluer toby gudis or merchandice to the said Johne in bery
merket for to pay of the sam Johnis gudis quhen he com hame again na that he
ordanit na gude til him that he bocht in Bery merket now borowit na siluer / apon
the siluer of the skynis tilhaf warit to his behuf in bery merket / the quhilkis
poyntis and articlis' beand previt as said is to morne at the farrest the said
henry salbe quite of Johne gregorijs clame And failyeand tharof tobe
dettour for sic gudis as he chargit him toby in bery meket eftir the tenour
of his bil

The same day the aldirman and the consel Ressauit Androw branche son and ayr til
quhilum thomas branche as assignay til his said fadir quhom god assoilye to the
quhilk androw alanson ane of the consel than beand present consentit to bruke and iois'
the watir that the said Vmquhile thomas his fadir had in tak and assedacione of
this towne for all the termis made to quhilum his said fadir nochtwithstanding ony as
signacione made to the said androw alanson tharapon of before be quhilum the forsaid thomas
the quhilk he renunsit and gaf owyr in fauour of the said androw branche et cetera

The xiiij day of marche the yer' et cetera lxxiiij before Johne the Vaus ane of the baillies
in the tolbuthe comperit henry mortimar' bringand with him Johne of hil burges
of this burgh . to swere with him eftir as it was ordanit be the assise anent the decret
and deliuerence made be thaim of the debatis and clamis of merchandice betuix him and
Johne gregory as the act made tharupon proportis offerand him and the said Johne of
hil to thare athis in presence of the said Johne gregory And than patrik badenach
forspekar to the said Johne allegit and said that the said Johne of hil was suspect
and aucht nocht to depone in the said caus' saiand that he was folowit in sic like
maner' of before Apon the quhilk he strekit a borch in Johne the Vausis hand
ane of the seriandis that he suld nocht be admittit nor pas to the said deposicione
sen he was suspect as said is the quhilk borch henry mortimar Recounterit
And for waiknes of the court the bailye Resplatit the warde and doune of
the said borch and Recounter quhil friday next tocum

The xvj day of marche the yer' et cetera lxxiiij lindesay harrold strekit a borch
apon Alexander scrogis as executour to ser Johne gal for the wrangwis' haldin
of a cowche bed with the pertinence tharof and of vthiris sindrie gudis contenit in a bil
made and schavin tharupon fra Aly gilruthe pertening til hir as ayrschip
as he allegit the quhilk borch he strake in the hand of alexander androson
ane of the seriandis in the name and on the behalf of the said Aly And til answer'
to the sam borch alexander scrogis askit lachfull day to the quhilk thare was
assignit the law day of this burgh eftir paisk next tocum et cetera
